title: Senior Member of Technical Staff
description:
**Company Description** 




 Siemens EDA, a part of Siemens Digital Industries Software, drives innovation in electronic design automation by providing advanced software and hardware solutions. With industry\\-leading tools, Siemens EDA enables seamless scaling and ensures predictable outcomes when transitioning to new technology. Leveraging a closed\\-loop digital twin, the company streamlines data flow across design, manufacturing, and the cloud for various systems like chips, boards, and electrical systems. Emphasizing openness and collaboration, Siemens EDA fosters interoperability across the EDA and electronics ecosystem.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time, on\\-site role for a Senior Member of Technical Staff located in Noida. The individual in this role will contribute to the development and optimization of software solutions, provide technical leadership within cross\\-functional teams, and collaborate closely with other engineers to develop high\\-quality and efficient software tools. Responsibilities include analyzing technical challenges in electronic design automation, designing innovative solutions, implementing algorithms, and enhancing product performance to meet customer needs. The role may also involve mentoring junior team members and contributing to long\\-term product vision and strategies.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Proficiency in Programming (C/C\\+\\+), Software Development, and Optimization
* Strong background in Algorithms, Data Structures, and Problem\\-Solving
* Experience in Electronic Design Automation (EDA), Hardware Design, and System\\-Level Scaling is a plus
* Collaboration and leadership skills for working in cross\\-functional teams, along with mentoring experience
* Strong communication skills to translate complex technical issues into actionable solutions
* Educational qualifications such as a Bachelorâ€™s, Masterâ€™s, or higher degree in Computer Science, Electrical, Electronics Engineering, or related fields are required
* Knowledge of Verilog/VHDL is a plus.

title: Student Intern
description:
**Headline: Internship Opportunity: Build the Future of PropTech with AI \\& Automation** 
 ðŸš€
 



**Company:** 
 Stealthmode Startup
 



**Role:** 
 Full Stack Developer Intern (PropTech / Automation)
 



**Location:** 
 Chennai (T. Nagar) / Coimbatore / Remote (Hybrid)
 



**Duration:** 
 Jan \\- Jun 2026 (4\\-6 Months)
 



  





**ðŸ‘‹ The Gist** 




 We are looking for a
 **Student Intern** 
 who wants to do more than just fix bugs. At Keyarite, we are building a web\\-based
 **Auction and Asset Reconstruction (ARC) platform** 
 to modernize how property foreclosures are managed.
 



 Right now, the industry is bogged down by manual data entry and paperwork. We are changing that. We are building an end\\-to\\-end automated workflow that connects buyers, banks, and field agents using AI, OCR, and seamless backend integration.
 



  





**ðŸ›  What You Will Actually Build** 




 You won't be fetching coffee; or fixing the bugs or entering excel data; you will be shipping code.
 



 Here is the mission:
 


* **Automation \\& Data Integrity:** 
 Build scripts to scrape data and a "Reserve Price Checker" using
 **OCR** 
 to catch pricing discrepancies in paper ads.
* **Field Agent Portal:** 
 Develop a mobile\\-friendly dashboard where agents can upload photos and valuations from the site, killing the manual data entry loop.
* **Geo\\-Tagging Solutions:** 
 Solve the "vague address" problem by creating logic to generate accurate Lat/Long coordinates for our agents.
* **AI \\& ML Integration:** 
 Work on
 **Agentic AI** 
 frameworks for social media marketing, build a basic ML model to classify properties (Posh/Developing/Normal), and implement smart CRM workflows.
* **Workflow Logic:** 
 Connect the dots between our CRM and bank portals to route leads automatically.



  





**ðŸ’» The Stack \\& Skills** 



* **Frontend:** 
 React or Vue
* **Backend:** 
 Python (Django) or Node.js
* **AI/Data:** 
 Experience with Web Scraping, OCR (Tesseract/Google Vision), and an understanding of Agentic AI / LLMs.
* **Database:** 
 SQL.
* **You:** 
 Currently enrolled in a Bachelor's/Master's program. You see a manual process and your first instinct is to write a script to automate it.



  





**ðŸŽ Whatâ€™s in it for you?** 



* **Mentorship:** 
 Work directly with an industry leader who will guide your growth.
* **Real Impact:** 
 Your code will drive business decisions, not just sit in a repository.
* **Stipend:** 
 Paid internship with a certificate upon completion. (It is the experience which will be more valuable than the stipend)



  





**ðŸ“© How to Apply** 
 If you are game to solve real\\-world problems with code, send your resume and a link to your GitHub/Portfolio to \\[Insert Email/Link].

title: VoIP Developer (Kamailio-focused)
description:
This is a remote position.
   

  

**Posting title:** 
 VoIP Developer (Kamailio\\-focused)
   

  

**Experience:** 
 3\\-8 Years
   

  

**Location:** 
 Remote

 Remote
   

  

**Primary skills:** 
 VoIP, Kamailio, IMS, Diameter, C/C\\+\\+ programming
   

  

**Qualification:** 
 Any Technical Degree
   

  

**Role Overview**
 We are looking for an experienced VoIP Developer with strong expertise in Kamailio/OpenSIPS, SIP\\-based communication systems, and a solid understanding of IMS/Diameter. The ideal candidate will have hands\\-on programming experience in C/C\\+\\+, strong debugging skills, and the ability to work on large\\-scale communication platforms.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain VoIP applications and SIP\\-based communication solutions.
* Work with SIP/SDP, RTP/SRTP, TLS, Diameter, and related communication protocols.
* Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to signaling, media, networking, and system performance.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams for feature development and platform enhancements.
* Perform code reviews and ensure high\\-quality deliverables.
* Work with databases (MySQL, MongoDB) for configuration, logging, and provisioning.
* Contribute to design discussions and provide technical guidance when required.


**Required Skills**
* Strong understanding of TCP/IP, VLAN, L3 VPNs.
* Excellent knowledge of SIP/SDP, RTP/SRTP, TLS protocols.

* Knowledge of IMS call flows.

* Strong troubleshooting, problem\\-solving, and debugging skills.

title: Lead Analyst Business Systems
description:
Our vision for the future is based on the idea that transforming financial lives starts by giving our people the freedom to transform their own. We have a flexible work environment, and fluid career paths. We not only encourage but celebrate internal mobility. We also recognize the importance of purpose, well\\-being, and work\\-life balance. Within Empower and our communities, we work hard to create a welcoming and inclusive environment, and our associates dedicate thousands of hours to volunteering for causes that matter most to them.
   

  

 Chart your own path and grow your career while helping more customers achieve financial freedom. Empower Yourself.
   

  

 Lead Business Systems Analysts take a leadership role in steering the evaluation of an organization's business processes and systems. Leveraging their expertise, they identify and implement advanced solutions to optimize efficiency and effectiveness. Leading collaboration with stakeholders to gather requirements, analyze complex data, and create comprehensive documentation outlining advanced system specifications. Lead analysts take a leadership role in facilitating communication between business users and IT teams, ensuring that high\\-level technology solutions align strategically with organizational goals.
   

  

**Essential Functions**
* Lead cross\\-functional teams in an Agile environment to gather and document business requirements for software development projects.
* Mentor junior and mid\\-level analysts and provide technical guidance
* Analyze and translate business needs into clear and concise user stories and Technical Requirements, ensuring alignment with project goals.
* Orchestrate communication between business stakeholders, Architects, and development teams to ensure a shared understanding of project requirements.
* Drive analysis of existing systems and processes to identify opportunities for improvement and efficiency gains.
* Partner with Quality Engineers and Software Engineers to review story requirements and validate system functionality
* Coordinate and support troubleshooting issues, conducting impact analysis, and recommending solutions
* Create technical solution and detailed process documentation
* Lead Agile Ceremonies such as Planning, Grooming, Sprint Reviews, Sprint Retrospectives, and 3 Amigos
* Stay informed about industryâ€™s best practices and emerging trends in business analysis and Agile methodologies.


**Qualifications**
* Bachelorâ€™s degree in a related field preferred
* 7\\+ experience as a Senior Business Systems Analyst or equivalent technology industry background
* In\\-depth knowledge and ability to analyze complex business processes and identify areas for improvement
* Extensive experience in identifying and solving business problems through innovative and practical solutions
* Advanced communication skills to convey technical information in a clear manner to all levels
* Proficient in collecting, documenting, and managing system requirements from stakeholders
* Detailed understanding of highly complex multi\\-platform applications and systems
* Effective communication and documentation skills to create comprehensive reports, manuals, workflows, and specifications
* Experience with assigning tasks and managing project timelines and project resources effectively to ensure successful project delivery.
* Ability to remain flexible and adaptable to shifts in project scope, requirements, or technological advancements, while also guiding the team through these transitions
* Financial Industry Experience preferred
* Prior production support and troubleshooting preferred
* Experience exceeding expectations in other roles on an Agile Development Team, such as Quality Engineer, Software Engineer, Product Owner, or Scrum Master preferred


 This job description is not intended to be an exhaustive list of all duties, responsibilities and qualifications of the job. The employer has the right to revise this job description at any time. You will be evaluated in part based on your performance of the responsibilities and/or tasks listed in this job description. You may be required perform other duties that are not included on this job description. The job description is not a contract for employment, and either you or the employer may terminate employment at any time, for any reason.
   

  

 We are an equal opportunity employer with a commitment to diversity. All individuals, regardless of personal characteristics, are encouraged to apply. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, marital status, pregnancy, religion, physical or mental disability, military or veteran status, genetic information, or any other status protected by applicable state or local law.
